trans-unit.source: Represents a retry exception that can be used by a messaging host such as <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowServiceHost"></xref> to communicate any cancellation of an attempted operation to the client.
trans-unit.target: 代表可由訊息主機例如為重試例外狀況<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowServiceHost"></xref>來傳達給用戶端操作嘗試任何取消。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RetryException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RetryException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RetryException"></xref> class with the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RetryException"></xref>類別具有指定的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RetryException"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RetryException"></xref>類別具有指定<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>和<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RetryException"></xref> class with the specified message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RetryException"></xref>具有指定的訊息和內部例外狀況類別。
